entities.name: snape
entities.description: Snape is described as reacting quickly to an attack, dropping his bag and pulling out his wand. He is also shown to be knocked off his feet by Sirius' spell.

entities.name: james
entities.description: James is described as shouting 'Expelliarmus!' and advancing on Snape with his wand up.

entities.name: sirius
entities.description: Sirius is described as letting out a bark of laughter and casting the spell 'Impedimenta' at Snape.

entities.name: wormtail
entities.description: Wormtail is described as watching hungrily and edging around Lupin to get a clearer view.

entities.name: lupin
entities.description: Lupin is mentioned as being in the way of Wormtail's view.
